product_name: Good MoleculesTravel Size Lightweight Daily Moisturizer
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackSmooth, hydrate, and prep your skin for makeup with Good Molecules Lightweight Daily Moisturizer formulated with a natural silicone alternative.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight, non-greasy finish layers well under makeupKey IngredientsPlant-based, naturally derived alternative to silicone helps smooth skin texture and plump up fine lines with a lightweight, breathable feelAvocado oil nourishes the skinShea butter helps soothe with antioxidant vitamin EItem 2630809How To UseGently massage moisturizer onto cleansed skin. Let fully absorb before applying other products. Suitable for daily use. For external use. Avoid contact with eyes.IngredientsWater, Propanediol, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Water.
how_to_use: Gently massage moisturizer onto cleansed skin. Let fully absorb before applying other products. Suitable for daily use. For external use. Avoid contact with eyes.

reviews.headline: Loved it!
reviews.comments: Lightweight not greasy at all. I would use this during summer.

reviews.headline: Good for the price ðŸ’°
reviews.comments: I bought this moustrizer because it was so cheap and because it has clean ingredints . Inittaly I thought it was too thick and sat on my skin but the more I use it the more I like it it does a good job but it's not anything special it's crazy to me how cheap it is and I would definitly recommend this to someone on a budget how wants a good moustrizer for a reasonble price .  I personally like it but there are better options like bubble and byoma gel mousteizers ðŸ’•âœ¨

reviews.headline: Plan to buy again
reviews.comments: Just start using for 2 weeks now love how it feels on my skin

reviews.headline: I'll buy again
reviews.comments: Just began using about 2 weeks now feels good on my skin

reviews.headline: I love Love Love, Good Molecules line
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this lightweight moisturizer by good molecules. I use it every day along with a few of their other serums and I have seen a lot of improvement in The quality of my skin. And at 54 years old, Dryness, uneven skin, tone and wrinkles are an ongoing issue. So to find a product that actually does what it says is wonderful. It effectively moisturizes without affecting my foundation and other makeup products.

reviews.headline: Ruined my skin
reviews.comments: It is incredibly thick and hard to rub in, yet is not moisturizing at all. It left my skin feeling tight and dry at first, but also made my skin greasy by the end of the day. It clogged my pores and broke me out. It made my already existing acne worse and gave me rashes and breakouta where I don't normally break out. It has caused my face to red, stinging, and itchy after about a week of use. I had to throw the rest out because my skin is so irritated.

reviews.headline: Enjoyed it
reviews.comments: I needed something to try, I was using the E.L.F hydrating moisturizer but it's summer time and Southwest heat was melting my face, literally. So I looked at different ones from Ulta but came across the Good Molecules moisturizer. It was just what I needed for my pockets. Lately as of the month of June. I've been using my moisturizer mornings and evenings.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: It really works keeps my face moisturizer

reviews.headline: Lives up to its name
reviews.comments: I use good molecules and love them  so I expected no less with the moisturizer it is definitely light weight  felt good going on not greasy.  Will be buying  again

reviews.headline: I like it...
reviews.comments: I was using another moisturizer that irritated my skin and moved to this product for some relief. This product works well with my sensitive skin without any irritation.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this again
reviews.comments: It's says it's light weight, but very heavy. Even with a pea size of product, you're rubbing for 30s at least.

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: Pretty basic. Works good but I will probably go back to usung my vannicream.

reviews.headline: eh
reviews.comments: i dont quite know how to feel about it

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Very mositurzing and i love this lotion for traveling!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I loved this product and it now comes in a travel size! This is the perfect size and if youre traveling you can put it in your carry on. Love this product!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I loved this product and it now comes in a travel size! This is the perfect size and if youre traveling you can put it in your carry on. Love this product!

reviews.headline: Great light weight moisturizer
reviews.comments: I got this as a free gift with purchase and I love it. Perfect for skin that is more oily. It didnt cause breakouts or clogged pores.
